title: 41 Cheap (But Expensive-Looking) Kitchen Accents on Amazon
text:
Photo: Courtesy of the retailers.

Whether you’re an amateur chef or a takeout master, chances are you spend a lot of time in your kitchen. And while we’ve rounded up the best accents for your apartment and bathroom before, here we’ve dug through Amazon to find the best kitchen décor ideas. Below, you’ll find gussied-up basics and restaurant-worthy accessories to spruce up your kitchen, regardless of your cooking prowess.

DII Everyday French Stripe Kitchen Tablecloth $26 (was $27, now 4% off) The chic stripes on this tablecloth are equal parts sophisticated and rustic. $26 at Amazon Buy $26 at Amazon Buy

OverandBack Marble Finish Bowls, Set of 4 Pair these bowls with the plates above to complete a moody, graphic place setting. $27 at Amazon Buy $27 at Amazon Buy

Brabantia Step Trash Can $76 (was $85, now 11% off) This trash can is a bit on the pricier side, but its elevated design and the range of available colors makes it worth the splurge. $76 at Amazon Buy $76 at Amazon Buy

YAMAZAKI Home Magnetic Spice Rack Keep your most-used spices and oils within easy reach with this no-install spice rack. $18 at Amazon Buy $18 at Amazon Buy

Duralex Made in France Picardie Clear Tumbler, Set of 6 $14 (was $20, now 30% off) To feel like a French girl when you’re drinking your red wine. $14 at Amazon Buy $14 at Amazon Buy

Creative Home Paper Towel Holder $9 (was $15, now 40% off) This copper paper towel holder will add an instant touch of class to any counter. $9 at Amazon Buy $9 at Amazon Buy

Breakfast: The Cookbook $28 (was $50, now 44% off) Not only does this cookbook look great on display — it also contains all the secrets to cooking the most important meal of the day. $28 at Amazon Buy $28 at Amazon Buy

Akaza Plastic Bag Holder $9 (was $11, now 18% off) You no longer need to store all your plastic bags in a (larger) plastic bag. $9 at Amazon Buy $9 at Amazon Buy

Crow Canyon Home Enamelware Mug, Set of 4 Take a sip out of these enamelware mugs, close your eyes, and imagine you’re off in a log cabin somewhere. $40 at Amazon Buy $40 at Amazon Buy

Kikkerland Fish Magic Soap $13 (was $15, now 13% off) Unlike actual soaps, this stainless-steel doodad — which promises to rid hands of any lingering garlic smells — will last forever. $13 at Amazon Buy $13 at Amazon Buy

White Matryoshka Dry Measuring Cups, Set of 6 $11 (was $13, now 15% off) A little bit of kitsch plus a whole lot of space-saving. $11 at Amazon Buy $11 at Amazon Buy

Areaware Table Tiles Nothing screams “adult” quite like a coaster. But these add a refreshing dose of whimsy to the otherwise super-practical accessory. $26 at Amazon Buy $26 at Amazon Buy

Calypso Basics by Reston Lloyd Harmonic Hum Whistling Teakettle with Glass Lid $36 (was $45, now 20% off) This teakettle comes in a rainbow of colors to match practically every palette. $36 at Amazon Buy $36 at Amazon Buy

Stelton EM Jug With Lid Drinking more water just got a whole lot easier with this stylish jug. $45 at Amazon Buy $45 at Amazon Buy

description: Affordable kitchen décor ideas from Amazon including Nawrap Binchotan Dishcloth, Caldo Linen Dinner Napkins, 4 Pack, DII Everyday French Stripe Kitchen Tablecloth, OTOTO Nessie Ladle Green, Menu Bottle Grinder, 2 Pack, and Stelton Bread Bag.
